name: No way out (itch) (Darxkl05)
description:
No way out is a 2000s inspired short horror game which mainly focuses on atmosphere. Your main objective is finding a way out, but who knows if you'll survive what waits for you at the end...

The game does not include any jumpscares, so all the horror comes from the environments you will find throughout the game. Headphones are highly reccomended, as they help in some parts of the game.

Play time: Around 15 minutes as maximum

MovementW A S DRunShiftInteractEToggle lightFNotes MenuTABUse keys1Use items2Exit gameEsc

This is my first game

Special thanks to some friends that helped me with some parts of the development, you can find them in the game credits.

/darxkl
